content.description: The writer wants to combine sentences 3 and 4 (reproduced below) in a way that expresses the unequal relationship between the ideas in these sentences.
content.question: I discovered that print is better suited to in-depth reading. E-readers have numerous advantages.In the context of the passage as a whole, which of the following choices best achieves this goal?

choices.label: I discovered that print is better suited to in-depth reading and that e-readers have numerous advantages.
E-readers have numerous advantages despite the fact that I discovered that print is better suited to in-depth reading.
Even though e-readers have numerous advantages, I discovered that print is better suited to in-depth reading.
Since e-readers have numerous advantages, I discovered that print is better suited to in-depth reading.

content.answer: Even though e-readers have numerous advantages, I discovered that print is better suited to in-depth reading.

skill.text: Skill 8.B: Write sentences that clearly convey ideas and arguments.
